Name: Thundering Poise
Title: Stilling Calamity: Thundering Poise
Desc: "...Tianqiu once played host to a Yaksha, four-armed and mighty."\n"He came to The Chasm from afar, to the praises of the tribes."

Talent.Name: Thundering Poise
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent card or a Character uses a Normal Attack:</color> Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
